table_description: an invoice line represents a single item or service listed on an invoice, including its description, quantity, unit price, and total cost. The sum of all invoice lines should equal the total amount of the invoice. You can add or remove invoice lines as needed, and in Scoro, you can hide prices on certain lines or even entire rows to customize the invoice's presentation.

table_columns.name: amount
table_columns.description: Quantity or amount of the product or service in the invoice line.

table_columns.name: comment
table_columns.description: Additional notes or comments about the invoice line item.

table_columns.name: cost
table_columns.description: Cost value associated with the invoice line item.
